headline: How To Grill Steak

reviewedBy.name: Delish Test Kitchen
reviewedBy.description: Delish is known for developing the most creative and outrageously good food on the planet. Each recipe is meticulously tested and perfected by our team of culinary experts, ensuring they’ll always be completely foolproof and totally fun.

video.description: Learn how to grill three types of steak with tips on marinading, seasoning, grilling, slicing, serving and topping options. Our favorite cuts our ribeye, flatiron, and flank steak. Come learn how to grill 'em all!
